get.summary: Retrieves a customer by their customer ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

get.summary: Retrieves the related party data of a customer by their customer ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the original customer.

post.summary: Adds a new related party to an existing customer.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the original customer.

requestBody.description: Information required to add related party to customer.

post.summary: Updates a customer's current address while maintaining their previous addresses history.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

requestBody.description: Information required to update the customer's address

delete.summary: Removes a related party link between two customers.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: relatedCustomerId
parameters.description: The ID of the related customer to unlink.

parameters.name: relatedPartyType
parameters.description: The type of related party. Used to disambiguate where a party is related in more than one way.

put.summary: Adds or updates a customer's identity document. Returns 200 OK when updating an existing ID, or 201 Created when adding a new ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: idCountryOfIssue
parameters.description: Country of issue.

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description: Type of identity document.

requestBody.description: The updated details of the identity document.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: idCountryOfIssue
parameters.description: Country of issue.

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description: Type of identity document.

put.summary: Adds or updates a customer's tax residency entry for the specified country. Returns 200 OK when updating an existing tax residency, or 201 Created when adding a new tax residency.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: countryOfTaxResidence
parameters.description: Country of tax residence.

requestBody.description: Tax residency details (TIN or reason for no TIN).

delete.summary: Removes a customer's tax residency entry for the specified country.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: countryOfTaxResidence
parameters.description: Country of tax residence to remove.

post.summary: Requests creation of retail customer. On a success, you will receive a customer ID which you can then use to create accounts for this customer.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

requestBody.description: Information required to create retail customer.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

requestBody.description: Information required to update a retail customer.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number at this address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's address.

validFrom.description: The date from which the customer started living at this address.

validTo.description: The date at which the customer stopped living at this address.

isCurrentAddress.description: Indicates if this is the customer's current address.

AddressGetResponse.description: The details of the customer's address history.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number at this address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's address.

validFrom.description: The date from which the customer started living at this address.

validTo.description: The date at which the customer stopped living at this address.

isCurrentAddress.description: Indicates if this is the customer's current address.

PreviousAddressGetResponse.description: The details of the customer's address history.

previousAddresses.description: Array of the customer's previous addresses.

AddressType.description: Represents the type of the address

CountryCode.description: 3-letter country codes as defined in ISO 3166-1

CraRating.description: The customer's CRA rating. Determined by the outcomes of your due diligence checks.

idNumber.description: The ID number of the document.

idExpiryDate.description: The expiry date of the document.

CreateCustomerIdentityDocumentRequest.description: Create an identity document for a customer

CreateCustomerNameAndCountryDetailsReque.description: Name and country details for a customer.

CreateCustomerNameAndDateOfBirthRequest.description: Name and date of birth details for a customer.

sanctions.description: Indicates if the customer is under sanctions.

nationalIdentificationNumber.description: The customer's national identification number, for example, their National Insurance (NI) number.

relatedCustomerId.description: The ID of the customer to be linked as a related party.

ownershipPercentage.description: The ownership percentage of the related party. Only allowed for UBO relationships.

CreateRelatedPartyRequest.description: A request to link one customer to another as a related party.

specialStatuses.description: The customer's special statuses, if any. Possible values include: 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentBraille', 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentLargeText', 'Vulnerability_Health_AudioImpairment', 'Vulnerability_Health_Other', 'Vulnerability_LifeEvents', 'Vulnerability_Resilience', and 'Vulnerability_Capability'

CreateRetailRequest.description: Request body for creating a retail customer.

taxResidencies.description: Gets or sets the collection of tax residencies to be created as part of the request.

CreateRetailTaxDetailsRequest.description: Tax details for a retail customer.

CreateTaxResidencyRequest.description: Request to create a information about a customer's tax residency, including country of tax residence and tax identification details.

customerId.description: Unique identifier of the original customer.

relatedCustomerId.description: Unique identifier of the newly linked customer.

CreatedRelatedPartyResponse.description: Response containing information about the created related party.

id.description: Unique identifier for the created retail customer. You should record this to be able to use it later.

CreatedResourceResponse.description: Response containing information about the created resource.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number of this address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the address is valid. Defaults to today if unspecified.

CustomerNameAndCountryDetailsPatchModel.description: Patch model containing only personal detail fields that were updated.

CustomerNameAndDateOfBirthPatchModel.description: Patch model containing only name and date of birth fields that were updated.

CustomerStatus.description: Represents the status of a customer in the system. This will always be 'Active'.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer under which the subresource was created.

CustomerSubresourceCreatedResponse.description: Represents the response returned when a subresource is created for a customer.

CustomerType.description: The type of customer. This will always be 'Retail'.

idNumber.description: The ID number of the identity document.

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of the identity document.

sanctions.description: Indicates if the customer is under sanctions.

KycAmlPatchModel.description:
Patch model containing KYC/AML fields that were updated.
Only properties that changed are present.

PepType.description: Indicates if the customer is a Politically Exposed Person.

PersonalDetailsPatchModel.description:
Patch model containing personal detail fields that were updated.
Only properties that changed are present.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number of this address.

streetName.description: The street name of this address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the address is valid.

validTo.description: Date until which the address was valid.

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807

RcaType.description: Indicates if the customer is a Relative or Close Associate.

ReasonForNoTaxId.description: Supported reasons for not having a tax ID (required if no tax ID number provided).

ownershipPercentage.description: The related party's ownership percentage, expressed as an integer.

id.description: The unique identifier of the customer. You should keep note of this, as you'll need it to amend or access the customer later.

institutionId.description: The unique identifier of the institution associated with this customer.

specialStatuses.description: The customer's special statuses, if any. Possible values include: 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentBraille', 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentLargeText', 'Vulnerability_Health_AudioImpairment', 'Vulnerability_Health_Other', 'Vulnerability_LifeEvents', 'Vulnerability_Resilience', and 'Vulnerability_Capability'

identityDocuments.description: Array of the customer's identity document details.

RetailCustomerGetResponse.description: The Retail Customer type response body.

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the retail customer.

specialStatuses.description: The customer's special statuses, if any. Possible values include: 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentBraille', 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentLargeText', 'Vulnerability_Health_AudioImpairment', 'Vulnerability_Health_Other', 'Vulnerability_LifeEvents', 'Vulnerability_Resilience', and 'Vulnerability_Capability'

RetailCustomerPatchResponse.description:
Summary of the fields that have been updated for retail customer PATCH.
Contains only sections and properties that were changed.

RetailCustomerTaxDetailsPatchModel.description: Patch model containing retail customer tax detail fields that were updated.

SpecialStatusType.description: Represents the type of special status.

taxResidencies.description: Collection of tax residencies of the customer.

USPerson.description: Specifies the classification of a person as a U.S. person for regulatory or reporting purposes.

buildingNameNumber.description: Building name or number of the customer's new address.

streetName.description: Street name of the customer's new address.

city.description: City of the customer's new address.

county.description: County of the customer's new address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's new address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the customer's new address is valid. Defaults to today if unspecified.

firstName.description:
The customer's first name.
Null value is ignored.

middleName.description:
The customer's middle name.
Null value is ignored.

surname.description:
The customer's surname.
Null value is ignored.

Update request for a non-account-holder's personal details limited to name components and country of residence.
Null values are ignored.

The customer's first name.

middleName.description:
The customer's middle name.

surname.description:
The customer's surname.
Null value is ignored.

dateOfBirth.description:
The customer's date of birth.

Name and date of birth details for a customer update request.
Null values are ignored.

idExpiryDate.description: Expiry date of the identity document.

sanctions.description:
Indicates if the customer is under sanctions.
Null value is ignored.

UpdateKycAmlRequest.description:
KYC AML update request.
Null values are ignored.

firstName.description:
The customer's first name.

middleName.description:
The customer's middle name.

surname.description:
The customer's surname.

dateOfBirth.description:
The customer's date of birth.
Null value is ignored.

email.description:
The customer's email address.
Null value is ignored.

telephone.description:
The customer's telephone number.
Null value is ignored.

nationalIdentificationNumber.description:
The customer's national identification number, such as their National Insurance (NI) number.
Null value is ignored.

UpdatePersonalDetailsRequest.description:
Personal Details update request.
Null values are ignored.

county.description: County of the customer's previous address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's previous address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the address is valid.

validTo.description: Date until which the address was valid.

nationalIdentificationNumber.description:
The customer's National Identification Number.
Null value is ignored.

specialStatuses.description: The customer's special statuses, if any. Null values are ignored.  All existing special statuses will be replaced with the provided collection. Possible values include: 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentBraille', 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentLargeText', 'Vulnerability_Health_AudioImpairment', 'Vulnerability_Health_Other', 'Vulnerability_LifeEvents', 'Vulnerability_Resilience', and 'Vulnerability_Capability'

UpdateRetailRequest.description:
Retail Customer update request.
Null values are ignored.

UpdateTaxResidencyRequest.description: The customer's tax residency update request.

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ValidationProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807
